column5: I hooked into this guy on Monday. 31 lbs of fightin gold. Safely released to fight again.
Nice Carp! I'll be fishing the harbour tomorrow I'll make sure to bring some corn!
Good luck or as we carpers say " Tight Lines " .
That is a fine specimen, Lorne.
I have yet to crack the 30lbs mark this year.  Actually, I just barely cracked 20!  So congratulations to ya( again )Lorne.
What kind of reel do you use? If it can stand up to constant carp fishing, it should be pretty well invincible. I'm in the market for a good spinning reel that can take a lot of drag pulling...
I use a baitcaster. An Abu Garcia Ambassaduer 6000. They are known as well built reels. In the states they are even marketed as carp reels with a custom side plate.
for general purpose spinning, stradics are mint (2500-5000 depending what you're doing with it)  strictly for carp fishing a baitrunner would be ideal
I am green with envy Lorne...Nice catch !!!
It's not time to fish that spot again is it?  Don't lick your fingers.    Nice Pig Lorne.
How else do I get the carp slime off of them?
